notes.en: Place where you go to cast your vote on election day. You must bring your ID and your voting card (stempas).
notes.zh: 选举日去投票的地方。需要带身份证和投票卡（stempas）。

notes.en: Official card you receive at home before an election. You must show it at the stembureau to vote.
notes.zh: 选举前邮寄到家中的官方投票卡，去投票站（stembureau）时必须出示。

notes.en: The right to vote in elections. In the Netherlands, most people have the right to vote from 18 years old.
notes.zh: 在选举中投票的权利。荷兰人大多从 18 岁起拥有选举权。

translations.zh: 联合政府 / 执政联盟

notes.en: Group of political parties that work together to form the government.
notes.zh: 几个政党合作组成的执政联盟，称为联合政府。

notes.en: Political parties that are not in the government and often criticise the coalition.
notes.zh: 没有进入政府、通常对执政联盟提出批评的政党。

notes.en: The ministers and the prime minister (minister-president) who govern the country.
notes.zh: 由首相（minister-president）和各部长组成、负责治理国家的机构。

notes.en: The leader of the Dutch government. He or she leads the ministers.
notes.zh: 荷兰政府的领袖，负责领导各个部长。

notes.en: The most important law of the country, which describes the basic rules of the state and citizens' rights.
notes.zh: 一个国家最重要的法律，规定国家的基本制度和公民的基本权利。

notes.en: Basic rights in the Constitution, such as freedom of religion and freedom of speech.
notes.zh: 写入宪法中的基本权利，例如宗教自由、言论自由等。

notes.en: Local taxes you pay to the municipality, for example for waste collection and water.
notes.zh: 向市政厅缴纳的地方税，例如垃圾处理费、自来水相关费用等。

notes.en: People who live next to or near your house.
notes.zh: 住在你家旁边或附近的人。

notes.en: Social contact with the people living around you, for example saying hello, small talk or helping each other.
notes.zh: 与周围邻居的社交接触，例如打招呼、聊天、互相帮忙。

translations.zh: 社区群聊 / 邻里 App 群

notes.en: WhatsApp or other app group for neighbours to share information about the neighbourhood, lost items or safety.
notes.zh: 邻居之间用来分享小区信息、丢失物品或安全提醒的聊天群（多为 WhatsApp）。

translations.zh: 游乐场 / 儿童活动场

notes.en: Outdoor place with swings and slides where children can play.
notes.zh: 有秋千、滑梯等设施，供孩子玩耍的户外场所。

notes.en: Children playing outside, for example on the street, schoolyard or playground.
notes.zh: 孩子在户外玩耍，例如在街边、学校操场或游乐场。

notes.en: Evening at school where parents talk with the teacher about their child.
notes.zh: 学校组织的晚上家长会，家长和老师一起谈孩子的情况。

notes.en: Paper or digital report that shows how a child is doing at school.
notes.zh: 记录孩子在学校学习和表现情况的纸质或电子报告。

translations.zh: 学校操场 / 校园广场

notes.en: Outside area of the school where children play during breaks.
notes.zh: 学校外面的活动区域，孩子在课间会到这里玩耍。

translations.zh: 家委 / 班级家长代表

notes.en: Parent who helps the teacher organise activities for the class, for example trips or parties.
notes.zh: 协助老师为班级组织活动（如郊游、班会）的家长代表。

notes.en: Unpaid work you do to help others or the community, for example in a buurthuis or sportvereniging.
notes.zh: 不拿工资、为了帮助他人或社区而做的工作，例如在社区中心或体育俱乐部当志愿者。

translations.zh: 邻里聚会 / 小区派对

notes.en: Event where neighbours come together in the street or square to eat, drink and talk.
notes.zh: 邻居们在街道或广场一起吃喝、聊天的活动。

notes.en: Volunteers in the neighbourhood who keep an eye on safety and report suspicious situations.
notes.zh: 社区志愿者关注治安、发现可疑情况会及时上报的制度或小组。

translations.zh: 交通补贴 / 车费报销

notes.en: Money your employer gives you for the costs of travelling to work, for example by train or car.
notes.zh: 雇主为你上下班交通支出提供的补贴或报销，例如火车票、开车油费等。

notes.en: System where you write down or enter the hours you have worked.
notes.zh: 记录你工作了多少小时的系统或表格。

notes.en: The times when you are expected to work, for example 9:00–17:00.
notes.zh: 你需要上班的时间段，例如 9:00–17:00。

notes.en: Person who is responsible for a small group of employees.
notes.zh: 负责带领一个小团队员工的负责人。

translations.zh: 工作表现面谈 / 绩效沟通

notes.en: Planned talk between employee and manager about how the work is going and what can be improved.
notes.zh: 员工和上级之间约好的谈话，讨论工作情况和可以改进的地方。

translations.zh: 评估面谈 / 考核谈话

notes.en: Meeting where your manager officially judges your work performance, sometimes linked to salary increase.
notes.zh: 上级正式评价你工作表现的谈话，有时会和加薪挂钩。

notes.en: Doing your job from home, usually with a laptop and internet.
notes.zh: 在家通过电脑和网络完成工作的方式。

translations.zh: 共享办公位 / 流动工位

notes.en: Workplace in the office that is not fixed for one person; employees choose a free desk each day.
notes.zh: 办公室里不固定分配给某一个人的工位，员工每天自由选择空位。

notes.en: Too much noise from neighbours or the street that bothers people.
notes.zh: 来自邻居或街道、让人感到困扰的噪音。

notes.en: When a tenant rents the house (or a room) again to someone else.
notes.zh: 租户再把整套房子或其中一间房转租给别人的情况。

notes.en: Subletting a house without permission from the landlord or housing corporation. This is forbidden.
notes.zh: 没有得到房东或房屋协会同意就转租房屋的行为，是违法的。

notes.en: Person in an apartment building who keeps an eye on the building and sometimes helps with small problems.
notes.zh: 在公寓楼里负责打理大楼、处理一些小问题的管理员。

notes.en: General word for a place where people can live, such as a room, apartment or house.
notes.zh: 人们可以居住的空间的总称，例如房间、公寓或整套房子。

translations.zh: 能源账单 / 水电煤气账单

notes.en: Bill for gas and electricity that you receive from the energy provider.
notes.zh: 能源公司寄来的燃气和电力费用账单。

notes.en: Money you pay in advance, for example every month for energy, which is later corrected with the real costs.
notes.zh: 提前支付的一笔钱，例如每月预交的能源费用，之后会根据实际用量结算多退少补。

translations.zh: 夜间 / 周末家庭医生急诊点

notes.en: Place where you can see a GP in the evening or weekend for urgent problems, when your own huisarts is closed.
notes.zh: 在晚上或周末、自己家庭医生关门时，用于处理紧急但非危及生命问题的家庭医生急诊点。

notes.en: Special phone number of your GP practice for urgent medical questions during opening hours.
notes.zh: 家庭医生诊所用于白天处理紧急医疗问题的专用电话号码。

notes.en: Consultation hours at the GP or hospital that take place in the evening.
notes.zh: 家庭医生或医院在晚上提供的门诊时间。

notes.en: Very common in supermarkets and shops. Look for "in de aanbieding" or "bonusaanbieding" on discount products.
notes.zh: 超市和商店里非常常见，比如货架上的 "in de aanbieding" 或 Albert Heijn 的 "bonus" 特价。

notes.en: Used in expressions like "Let op!" (pay attention) and "aandacht besteden aan" (to pay attention to something).
notes.zh: 常见搭配有 "Let op!"（注意！）和 "aandacht besteden aan..."（对…给予关注）。

notes.en: Traditional Dutch staple food, often eaten cooked or as mashed potatoes ("aardappelpuree").
notes.zh: 传统主食之一，经常煮着吃，或做成土豆泥 (aardappelpuree)。

notes.en: Popular summer fruit, used on bread, in desserts or with whipped cream.
notes.zh: 夏天常见的水果，可切片放在面包上，或做甜点、配奶油。

translations.zh: 订阅 / 月票 / 年票

notes.en: Used for phone contracts, internet, public transport (OV-abonnement) or gym membership.
notes.zh: 常用于手机、宽带、公共交通 (OV-abonnement) 或健身房等长期订阅。

notes.en: Person who plays a role in films, series or theatre.
notes.zh: 在电影、电视剧或舞台剧中表演角色的人。

translations.zh: 促销 / 行动 / 活动

notes.en: "In de actie" often means a product is cheaper; it can also mean a campaign or protest action.
notes.zh: 在超市里 "in de actie" 多指商品在打折；也可以指某个活动或抗议行动。

notes.en: Used for people and things: "actief zijn" (to be active), "actieve vakantie" (active holiday).
notes.zh: 既可形容人也可形容事：例如 "actief zijn"（很积极）、"actieve vakantie"（动来动去的假期）。

notes.en: In expressions like "haal diep adem" (take a deep breath) or "buiten adem" (out of breath).
notes.zh: 常见搭配："haal diep adem"（深呼吸）、"buiten adem"（喘不过气）。

notes.en: You see adverts in newspapers, online (bijvoorbeeld op Marktplaats) or on the street.
notes.zh: 可以是报纸广告、网上广告（例如 Marktplaats 上的商品信息）或街头海报。

notes.en: "Advies vragen" means to ask someone for advice, for example a doctor, teacher or friend.
notes.zh: "advies vragen" 表示向别人征求意见，比如问医生、老师或朋友的建议。

notes.en: Used both at work (finance department, HR) and in shops (clothing department, fruit & vegetables).
notes.zh: 既可指公司的财务部、人事部，也可指超市里的蔬果区、服装区等分区。

notes.en: Used for picking up parcels (pakket afhalen) or takeaway food ("afhaalchinees" for Chinese takeaway).
notes.zh: 常用于取包裹 (pakket afhalen) 或买外卖，比如 "afhaalchinees"（中餐外卖店）。

translations.en: to pay the bill / to settle up

notes.en: In shops or restaurants: "Zullen we even afrekenen?" (Shall we pay the bill?).
notes.zh: 在商店或餐厅常听到："Zullen we even afrekenen?"（我们去结个账吧？）。

notes.en: Often used as "de tafel afruimen" after dinner.
notes.zh: 经常说 "de tafel afruimen"，指吃完饭后把餐桌收拾干净。

translations.en: to say goodbye / to take leave

notes.en: Used when leaving a job, moving house or at a funeral: "afscheid nemen van iemand".
notes.zh: 在离职、搬家或葬礼等场景常用，表达和某人或某个阶段道别。

notes.en: During COVID you often heard "1,5 meter afstand houden" (keep 1.5 metres distance).
notes.zh: 新冠期间常听到 "1,5 meter afstand houden"（保持 1.5 米距离）。

notes.en: Used for TV, set-top box or other devices: "Waar is de afstandsbediening?"
notes.zh: 常指电视或机顶盒的遥控器："Waar is de afstandsbediening?"（遥控器在哪？）。

translations.zh: 厨房操作台 / 洗菜池

notes.en: The worktop in the kitchen, often with the sink built in: "het aanrecht schoonmaken" (clean the counter).
notes.zh: 厨房里带水槽的操作台，可说 "het aanrecht schoonmaken"（把台面擦干净）。

translations.zh: 愉快的 / 令人舒服的

notes.en: Formal way to say "Nice to meet you" when you introduce yourself: "Aangenaam".
notes.zh: 正式场合自我介绍时常说 "Aangenaam"，相当于“幸会 / 很高兴认识你”。

notes.en: Used for yourself ("Ik kleed me aan") or for children ("Ik kleed de kinderen aan").
notes.zh: 可以说 "Ik kleed me aan"（我穿衣服），也可以说 "Ik kleed de kinderen aan"（我给孩子穿衣）。

notes.en: On timetables you see "vertrek" (departure) and "aankomst" (arrival).
notes.zh: 在时刻表上常见与 "vertrek"（出发）相对的 "aankomst"（到达）。

notes.en: Used for accepting something ("een baan aannemen") or hiring staff ("iemand aannemen").
notes.zh: 既可以指接受一份工作 (een baan aannemen)，也可以指公司录用员工 (iemand aannemen)。

notes.en: General word for a place where people live, such as an apartment or house.
notes.zh: 人们居住的地方的通用说法，可以是公寓也可以是独栋房子。

notes.en: Often used on forms to indicate which city or town you live in.
notes.zh: 表格上常见，用来填写你现在居住的城市或镇。

notes.en: You can say "Ik heb een allergie voor pinda's" (I am allergic to peanuts).
notes.zh: 可以说 "Ik heb een allergie voor ..." 来表达“我对…过敏”。

notes.en: Chronic lung disease; important to mention to your huisarts.
notes.zh: 一种慢性呼吸系统疾病，向家庭医生说明自己有哮喘非常重要。

notes.en: You get vitamins from healthy food like fruit and vegetables or from supplements.
notes.zh: 可以从水果、蔬菜等健康食物，或补充剂中获得维生素。

notes.en: For cuts or open skin; you may need a plaster (pleister) or stitches.
notes.zh: 指皮肤破损的伤口，可能需要贴创可贴 (pleister) 或缝针。

notes.en: "Ik ben zwanger" (I am pregnant). In the Netherlands, pregnant women are often guided by a midwife (verloskundige).
notes.zh: 可以说 "Ik ben zwanger"（我怀孕了）。荷兰通常由助产士 (verloskundige) 跟进孕期。

notes.en: Emergency car that takes sick or injured people to the hospital. You call 112 in life‑threatening situations.
notes.zh: 把重病或受伤的人送往医院的救护车，生命危险时拨打 112。

notes.en: Used when you feel tense before an exam, job interview or important talk.
notes.zh: 常用来形容考试、面试或重要谈话前的紧张心情。

notes.en: List you make before going to the supermarket so you don’t forget what to buy.
notes.zh: 去超市前写的购物清单，避免忘记要买的东西。

notes.en: Place in the shop where you pay; you often hear "De volgende klant aan de kassa".
notes.zh: 商店里付款的地方，经常听到 "De volgende klant aan de kassa"（下一位顾客请到收银台）。

notes.en: Small bag for your money and bank cards; don’t forget it when you go shopping.
notes.zh: 装现金和银行卡的小包，出门购物时别忘了带。

notes.en: Can be a shopping bag, school bag or handbag.
notes.zh: 可以是购物袋、书包或手提包。

notes.en: Common public transport in big cities like Amsterdam, The Hague and Rotterdam.
notes.zh: 阿姆斯特丹、海牙、鹿特丹等大城市常见的公共交通工具。

notes.en: Underground or fast light rail, for example in Amsterdam and Rotterdam.
notes.zh: 地下或轻轨系统，例如阿姆斯特丹和鹿特丹的地铁。

notes.en: NS trains connect most Dutch cities; you can sit in "stilte-coupé" (quiet carriage).
notes.zh: NS 火车连接大部分城市，还可以选择安静车厢（stilte-coupé）。

notes.en: Local or regional bus; you often check the timetable in an app like 9292.
notes.zh: 市内或区域公交车，时刻表常用 9292 等 APP 查询。

notes.en: Not mandatory for adults, but recommended, especially for children.
notes.zh: 成年人不强制戴，但建议佩戴，尤其是小孩。

notes.en: Very common in the Netherlands; combine with "paraplu" and "regenjas".
notes.zh: 荷兰非常常见的天气，常和雨伞 paraplu、雨衣 regenjas 一起出现。

notes.en: Weather with low visibility; important when driving or cycling.
notes.zh: 能见度低的天气，开车或骑车时要格外小心。

notes.en: Snow can make cycling and walking slippery.
notes.zh: 下雪时路面很滑，骑车和走路都要注意安全。

notes.en: One of the four seasons, often rainy and windy in the Netherlands.
notes.zh: 四季之一，荷兰的秋天常常又湿又有风。

notes.en: Season with flowers and longer days; popular word because of tulips.
notes.zh: 春天百花盛开，白天变长，也和郁金香季节联系在一起。

notes.en: Often used in "zomervakantie" (summer holiday).
notes.zh: 常见于 "zomervakantie"（暑假、暑期度假）。

notes.en: Cold season; people wear a warm coat, scarf and gloves.
notes.zh: 一年中最冷的季节，人们会穿厚外套、围巾和手套。

notes.en: Worn around the neck in winter to keep warm.
notes.zh: 冬天围在脖子上保暖的衣物。

notes.en: You wear gloves when it is cold outside.
notes.zh: 天气很冷时戴在手上的保暖用品。

notes.en: Small pocket in your trousers where people often keep keys or coins.
notes.zh: 裤子上的小口袋，很多人会把钥匙或硬币放在里面。

notes.en: Can be a landline or mobile phone, depending on the context.
notes.zh: 既可以指座机，也可以指手机，具体含义看上下文。

notes.en: Most people in the Netherlands communicate via mobile phone and apps like WhatsApp.
notes.zh: 荷兰人主要通过手机和 WhatsApp 等应用联系彼此。

notes.en: Device you use to charge your phone, laptop or bike battery.
notes.zh: 给手机、电脑或电动自行车电池充电的设备。

notes.en: Big cart you push in the supermarket for your groceries.
notes.zh: 超市里推着装购物物品的大购物车。

translations.zh: 十字路口 / 交叉路口

notes.en: Place where two or more roads cross each other.
notes.zh: 两条或多条道路交汇的地方。

notes.en: Circular intersection where traffic drives around a central island.
notes.zh: 车辆绕中心岛行驶的圆形路口。

notes.en: Lamp with red, orange and green lights that controls traffic.
notes.zh: 由红、黄、绿三色灯组成，用来控制交通的信号灯。

notes.en: Part of the street where pedestrians walk; not for bikes.
notes.zh: 行人行走的路，一般不允许骑自行车。

notes.en: Striped crossing where cars must stop for pedestrians.
notes.zh: 路面上画有条纹的行人过街线，车辆需要礼让行人。

notes.en: Line of slow or standing cars; you often hear it in the traffic news (verkeersinformatie).
notes.zh: 高速或道路上缓慢或停着的一长排车辆，交通信息里常会提到。

notes.en: Marked place where you may park your car, sometimes paid.
notes.zh: 画线允许停放车辆的地方，有时需要付费。

notes.en: Place where you buy fuel for your car; also sells snacks and drinks.
notes.zh: 给汽车加油的地方，通常也卖零食和饮料。

notes.en: Useful when buying clothes or furniture: "Welke kleur wilt u?"
notes.zh: 买衣服或家具时常会问："Welke kleur wilt u?"（您要什么颜色？）。

notes.en: Clothing size or shoe size; you can ask for a different size in a shop.
notes.zh: 衣服或鞋子的尺码，在店里可以说想要换个尺寸。

notes.en: How much something costs; combine with "korting" and "aanbieding".
notes.zh: 东西的价钱，常和折扣 korting、特价 aanbieding 等词一起出现。

notes.en: Paper or digital coupon that gives you a discount when you pay.
notes.zh: 纸质或电子的优惠券，付款时可以抵扣一部分金额。

notes.en: Instructions for how to cook a dish; many Dutch families share simple recepten.
notes.zh: 教你做菜的说明，很多家庭会互相分享简单的 recepten。

notes.en: Basket on your bike or in the supermarket to carry things.
notes.zh: 可以放在自行车上或超市里用来装东西的篮子。

notes.en: You put toothpaste on your toothbrush to brush your teeth.
notes.zh: 刷牙时挤在牙刷上的牙膏。

notes.en: Used for washing your hair; bought at the supermarket or drogist.
notes.zh: 用于洗头的洗发用品，可在超市或药妆店（drogist）购买。

notes.en: Solid or liquid soap for washing hands or body.
notes.zh: 固体或液体的香皂/洗手液，用来洗手或洗澡。

notes.en: Place where many people work at desks with computers.
notes.zh: 很多人坐在电脑前工作的办公场所。

notes.en: Important tool for work, study and administration.
notes.zh: 工作、学习和处理行政事务时都离不开的工具。

notes.en: Formal way of written communication for work, school and government.
notes.zh: 在工作、学校和政府场景中常用的正式书面沟通方式。

notes.en: Letter you send when you apply for a job, together with your CV.
notes.zh: 应聘工作时随简历一起发送的求职信。

notes.en: Document with your work experience and education, used for job applications.
notes.zh: 记录你的工作经历和教育背景，用于求职的文档。

notes.en: Period of practice at a company, often part of a study programme.
notes.zh: 在公司进行实践学习的一段时间，通常是学业的一部分。

notes.en: Working around 36–40 hours per week.
notes.zh: 每周工作大约 36–40 小时。

notes.en: Working fewer hours than a full-time job, for example 16 or 24 hours.
notes.zh: 工作时间少于全职，例如每周 16 或 24 小时。

notes.en: Normal day when you are expected to work, usually Monday to Friday.
notes.zh: 需要上班的日子，通常是周一到周五。

notes.en: Short break during work or school; you often drink coffee or tea.
notes.zh: 工作或上课中的短暂休息时间，常会喝杯咖啡或茶。

notes.en: Break in the middle of the day to eat lunch, often bread with cheese.
notes.zh: 中午的休息时间用来吃午饭，很多人吃面包配奶酪。

notes.en: Another word for arbeidsovereenkomst; describes your job conditions.
notes.zh: 和 arbeidsovereenkomst 类似的说法，写明你的工作条件和权利义务。

notes.en: Amount of money you earn per hour of work.
notes.zh: 你每工作一小时可以获得的工资数额。

notes.en: Paper or digital document that shows your salary and deductions each month.
notes.zh: 每月列出工资和各种扣款的纸质或电子文件。

notes.en: Used when there is a lot of work and people feel stressed.
notes.zh: 指工作任务很多、员工感到压力很大的情况。

notes.en: Room in the office where meetings and discussions take place.
notes.zh: 办公室里专门用于开会和讨论的房间。

translations.zh: 企业医生 / 职业病医生

notes.en: Doctor who advises employer and employee about health at work.
notes.zh: 为雇主和雇员提供与工作相关健康建议的医生。

notes.en: Time off from work or school; you build up vakantiedagen each year.
notes.zh: 不上班不上学的休息时间，每年会累积一定的带薪假期（vakantiedagen）。

notes.en: Days when you do not have to work, for example holidays or personal leave.
notes.zh: 不用上班的日子，例如节假日或个人请假。

notes.en: Money you may receive from your employer when you are dismissed.
notes.zh: 被解雇时雇主可能需要支付给你的补偿金。

notes.en: Tall building with many apartments.
notes.zh: 包含很多套公寓的高层楼房。

notes.en: Home that is part of a larger building, not a separate house.
notes.zh: 大楼里的一套住房，不是独立的整栋房子。

notes.en: Small outside space attached to your apartment.
notes.zh: 连接在公寓上的小型室外空间，可以晒太阳或晾衣服。

notes.en: Room where people sit, watch TV and receive visitors.
notes.zh: 家里用来坐着休息、看电视、接待客人的房间。

notes.en: Room where you sleep; many Dutch houses have small slaapkamers.
notes.zh: 睡觉的房间，很多荷兰房子的卧室都比较小。

notes.en: Room with shower or bath, often combined with the toilet.
notes.zh: 有淋浴或浴缸的房间，常常和马桶在同一个空间。

notes.en: Room where you cook; contains a cooker, fridge and kitchen cupboards.
notes.zh: 做饭的地方，通常有灶台、冰箱和橱柜。

notes.en: Small room with a toilet; in Dutch houses it is sometimes separate from the bathroom.
notes.zh: 只有马桶的小房间，在荷兰家庭里有时和浴室分开。

notes.en: Dutch houses often have steep stairs; be careful with children.
notes.zh: 荷兰很多住宅楼梯都比较陡，带孩子上下楼要特别小心。

notes.en: Space under the roof, often used for storage or an extra bedroom.
notes.zh: 屋顶下面的空间，常被用来储物或改成额外卧室。

notes.en: Amount of money you pay every month for renting a house.
notes.zh: 你每个月为租房需要支付的金额。

notes.en: Yearly increase of the rent; tenants receive a letter about it.
notes.zh: 每年房租上涨时，房东会寄来说明涨价的信。

notes.en: Number on the front of the house, part of your official address.
notes.zh: 写在房子门口或门上的号码，是正式地址的一部分。

notes.en: Box at the post office where you can receive mail instead of at home.
notes.zh: 在邮局租用的信箱，用来代替寄到家里的信件。

notes.en: Slot or box where the postman delivers letters at your house.
notes.zh: 邮递员把信件投递到你家的小箱子或门上的投信口。

notes.en: "Een dak boven je hoofd" means having a place to live.
notes.zh: 荷兰语表达 "een dak boven je hoofd" 意为“头上有个屋顶”，也就是有地方住。

notes.en: Outside area with grass or plants behind or in front of the house.
notes.zh: 房子前面或后面的室外区域，可以种草和花。

notes.en: Small separate building or room for bikes and tools.
notes.zh: 用于放自行车、工具等物品的小屋或储物间。

translations.zh: 公共区域 / 共享空间

notes.en: Space in a building that all residents may use, such as hallway or laundry room.
notes.zh: 楼里所有住户都可以使用的空间，比如走廊、洗衣房等。

notes.en: Area of a town with many houses and few businesses.
notes.zh: 主要是住宅、商店较少的城区或街区。

notes.en: Symptom where you cough; often together with verkoudheid or griep.
notes.zh: 咳嗽是一种常见症状，常常和感冒或流感一起出现。

notes.en: Liquid medicine you drink to reduce coughing; bought at drogist or apotheek.
notes.zh: 喝的止咳药水，可以在药妆店或药房购买。

notes.en: Small round medicine; you take it with water.
notes.zh: 小圆形的药，用水送服。

notes.en: Flat medicine in tablet form, similar to a pill.
notes.zh: 扁平的片剂药物，和 pill 类似。

notes.en: Medicine that is put into your body with a needle.
notes.zh: 通过针头打入身体里的药物。

notes.en: Material you put on a wound to protect it.
notes.zh: 覆盖在伤口上的敷料或绷带，用来保护伤口。

notes.en: Hard material around a broken arm or leg so it can heal.
notes.zh: 包在骨折手臂或腿上的硬石膏，用来固定骨头帮助恢复。

notes.en: You wear glasses to see better; sunglasses are "zonnebril".
notes.zh: 帮助看清楚的眼镜，太阳镜叫 "zonnebril"。

notes.en: Treatment by a fysiotherapeut to improve movement or reduce pain.
notes.zh: 由理疗师（fysiotherapeut）进行的治疗，帮助改善行动或减轻疼痛。

notes.en: Small device that people with asthma use to inhale medicine.
notes.zh: 哮喘患者常用的小型吸入装置，用来吸入药物。

notes.en: Used in expressions like "spoedlijn" and "Spoedeisende Hulp".
notes.zh: 常见于 "spoedlijn"（紧急电话）和 "Spoedeisende Hulp"（急诊）。

notes.en: "Eerste Hulp Bij Ongelukken"; many schools and companies offer EHBO-courses.
notes.zh: 全称 "Eerste Hulp Bij Ongelukken"，很多学校和公司都会提供 EHBO 急救课程。

notes.en: Nausea in the morning, often during pregnancy.
notes.zh: 早晨感到恶心想吐，常见于怀孕早期。

notes.en: Regular check at the huisarts, dentist or hospital.
notes.zh: 在家庭医生、牙医或医院做的定期检查或复查。

notes.en: You can have high or low blood pressure; measured with a cuff.
notes.zh: 可以是高血压或低血压，用袖带式仪器测量。

notes.en: More serious than a simple cold; sometimes you get a griepprik (flu shot).
notes.zh: 比普通感冒更严重，有时会接种流感疫苗（griepprik）。

notes.en: General word for medicines someone uses for a longer time.
notes.zh: 用于长期服用的药物的总称。

notes.en: In the Netherlands the national emergency number is 112.
notes.zh: 荷兰全国统一的紧急电话号码是 112。

notes.en: Building or group of huisartsen where you are registered.
notes.zh: 你注册所属的家庭医生诊所或多位家庭医生组成的合伙诊所。

notes.en: Room where you wait before your appointment at the doctor or hospital.
notes.zh: 在医生诊所或医院等候看诊的房间。

notes.en: Government organisation that collects taxes and sends the famous blue envelopes.
notes.zh: 负责征税和寄出“蓝色信封”的政府机构。

translations.zh: 市政厅 / 市政府办公楼

notes.en: Building where the gemeente works and where you go for many procedures.
notes.zh: 市政工作人员办公的地方，很多手续需要去那里办理。

notes.en: Often another word for gemeentehuis, especially in bigger cities.
notes.zh: 在大城市里常用来指市政厅，与 gemeentehuis 含义接近。

notes.en: Official ID document besides a passport or residence permit.
notes.zh: 除护照、居留卡之外的一种官方带照片身份证件。

notes.en: Small official photo used for IDs, driving licence and OV-chipkaart.
notes.zh: 用于身份证、驾照、公交卡等的标准小照片。

notes.en: Form you fill in to register for school, a course or at the gemeente.
notes.zh: 用于在学校、课程或市政厅进行登记或报名时填写的表格。

notes.en: General word for documents with boxes you have to fill in.
notes.zh: 需要填写各种信息的表格的通称。

notes.en: Often you must send a copy of your ID or contract.
notes.zh: 很多手续需要提供身份证或合同的复印件。

notes.en: The original document, not a copy; sometimes you must show it at the gemeente.
notes.zh: 文件的原始版本，不是复印件，有时需要带去市政厅出示。

notes.en: Special form you use to apply for a benefit or permit.
notes.zh: 用于申请补助、津贴或许可证的专门表格。

notes.en: Official list that is open for everyone to check, for example company details.
notes.zh: 任何人都可以查阅的官方登记列表，例如公司登记信息。

notes.en: On forms you often must fill in your nationality.
notes.zh: 在各种表格中，经常需要填写自己的国籍。

notes.en: Number you receive when you are registered, for example at a housing corporation.
notes.zh: 在房屋协会等机构注册后获得的编号。

notes.en: Four digits plus two letters in Dutch addresses, for example 1234 AB.
notes.zh: 荷兰地址中的邮编格式是 4 位数字 + 2 个字母，例如 1234 AB。

notes.en: Money you pay to the gemeente for handling an application, for example for a passport.
notes.zh: 为办理护照等事项向市政厅支付的手续费用。

notes.en: Letter or e-mail that confirms the date and time of your appointment.
notes.zh: 确认你预约的日期和时间的信件或电子邮件。

notes.en: Letter you receive if you forgot to pay a bill or respond to an earlier letter.
notes.zh: 如果你忘记付账单或没有回复之前的信件，就可能会收到的提醒或催缴信。

notes.en: If you do not agree with a decision from the gemeente or Belastingdienst, you can "bezwaar maken".
notes.zh: 如果不同意市政厅或税务局的决定，可以 "bezwaar maken"（提出书面异议）。

notes.en: Government agency that handles unemployment benefits and some disability benefits.
notes.zh: 负责办理失业金和部分伤残津贴的政府机构。

notes.en: Organisation that pays child benefit (kinderbijslag) and AOW pensions.
notes.zh: 负责发放儿童金 (kinderbijslag) 和 AOW 养老金的机构。
